InlineForeignKeyField.description:
A basic integer field that deals with validating the given value to a
given parent instance in an inline.

default.invalid_choice: The inline value did not match the parent instance.

ModelChoiceField.description: A ChoiceField whose choices are a model QuerySet.

ModelMultipleChoiceField.description: A MultipleChoiceField whose choices are a model QuerySet.

BaseForm.description:
The main implementation of all the Form logic. Note that this class is
different than Form. See the comments by the Form class for more info. Any
improvements to the form API should be made to this class, not to the Form
class.

Form.description: A collection of Fields, plus their associated data.

ComboField.description: A Field whose clean() method calls multiple Field clean() methods.

default.overflow: The number of days must be between {min_days} and {max_days}.

default.invalid: No file was submitted. Check the encoding type on the form.
default.contradiction: Please either submit a file or check the clear checkbox, not both.

default.invalid_choice: Select a valid choice. %(value)s is not one of the available choices.

default.invalid_image: Upload a valid image. The file you uploaded was either not an image or a corrupted image.
Upload a valid image. The file you uploaded was either not an image or a corrupted image.

MultiValueField.description: Aggregate the logic of multiple Fields.
MultiValueField.longDescription:
Its clean() method takes a "decompressed" list of values, which are then
cleaned into a single value according to self.fields. Each value in
this list is cleaned by the corresponding field -- the first value is
cleaned by the first field, the second value is cleaned by the second
field, etc. Once all fields are cleaned, the list of clean values is
"compressed" into a single value.

Subclasses should not have to implement clean(). Instead, they must
implement compress(), which takes a list of valid values and returns a
"compressed" version of those values -- a single value.

You'll probably want to use this with MultiWidget.

default.invalid_choice: Select a valid choice. %(value)s is not one of the available choices.

NullBooleanField.description:
A field whose valid values are None, True, and False. Clean invalid values
to None.

default.invalid_choice: Select a valid choice. %(value)s is not one of the available choices.
Select a valid choice. %(value)s is not one of the available choices.

MoneyFieldWidget.description: Replacement for NumberInput widget adding the currency suffix.

MoneyFormField.description:
Use this field type in Django Forms instead of a DecimalField, whenever a input field for
the Money representation is required.

default.invalid_choice: Select a valid choice. That choice is not one of the available choices.
Select a valid choice. That choice is not one of the available choices.
Select a valid choice. That choice is not one of the available choices.
Select a valid choice. That choice is not one of the available choices.

MultiSizeField.description:
Some size input fields must be specified per Bootstrap breakpoint. Use this multiple
input field to handle this.

default.invalid_choice: Select a valid choice. %(value)s is not one of the available choices.
Select a valid choice. %(value)s is not one of the available choices.

SizeField.description:
Use this field for validating input containing a value ending in ``px``, ``em``, ``rem`` or ``%``.
Use it for values representing a size, margin, padding, width or height.

TranslatedField.description: Proxy field attached to a model.
TranslatedField.longDescription:
The field is automatically added to the shared model.
However, this can be assigned manually to be more explicit, or to pass the ``any_language`` value.
The ``any_language=True`` option causes the attribute to always return a translated value,
even when the current language and fallback are missing.
This can be useful for "title" attributes for example.

Example:

.. code-block:: python

    from django.db import models
    from parler.models import TranslatableModel, TranslatedFieldsModel

    class MyModel(TranslatableModel):
        title = TranslatedField(any_language=True)  # Add with any-fallback support
        slug = TranslatedField()                    # Optional, but explicitly mentioned


    class MyModelTranslation(TranslatedFieldsModel):
        # Manual model class:
        master = models.ForeignKey(MyModel, related_name='translations', null=True)
        title = models.CharField("Title", max_length=200)
        slug = models.SlugField("Slug")

MultiWidget.description: A widget that is composed of multiple widgets.
MultiWidget.longDescription:
In addition to the values added by Widget.get_context(), this widget
adds a list of subwidgets to the context as widget['subwidgets'].
These can be looped over and rendered like normal widgets.

You'll probably want to use this class with MultiValueField.

MultipleHiddenInput.description:
Handle <input type="hidden"> for fields that have a list
of values.

NullBooleanSelect.description: A Select Widget intended to be used with NullBooleanField.

SelectDateWidget.description: A widget that splits date input into three <select> boxes.
SelectDateWidget.longDescription:
This also serves as an example of a Widget that has more than one HTML
element and hence implements value_from_datadict.

SplitDateTimeWidget.description: A widget that splits datetime input into two <input type="text"> boxes.

SplitHiddenDateTimeWidget.description: A widget that splits datetime input into two <input type="hidden"> inputs.

AdminSplitDateTime.description: A SplitDateTime Widget that has some admin-specific styling.

AutocompleteMixin.description: Select widget mixin that loads options from AutocompleteJsonView via AJAX.
AutocompleteMixin.longDescription:
Renders the necessary data attributes for select2 and adds the static form
media.

FilteredSelectMultiple.description: A SelectMultiple with a JavaScript filter interface.
FilteredSelectMultiple.longDescription:
Note that the resulting JavaScript assumes that the jsi18n
catalog has been loaded in the page

ForeignKeyRawIdWidget.description:
A Widget for displaying ForeignKeys in the "raw_id" interface rather than
in a <select> box.

ManyToManyRawIdWidget.description:
A Widget for displaying ManyToMany ids in the "raw_id" interface rather than
in a <select multiple> box.

RelatedFieldWidgetWrapper.description:
This class is a wrapper to a given widget to add the add icon for the
admin interface.

BorderChoiceWidget.description: Use this field to enter the three values of a border: width style color.

ColorPickerWidget.description:
Use this field to enter a color value. Clicking onto this widget will pop up a color picker.
The value passed to the consumer is a tuple of a Boolean and a string guaranteed to be in #rgb format.

JSONMultiWidget.description:
Deprecated.
Base class for MultiWidgets using a JSON field in database.

MultipleTextInputWidget.description: A widgets accepting multiple input values.

invalid_message.default: In '%(label)s': Value '%(value)s' shall contain a valid decimal number.
